title: Hannes Famira
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809032929/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809032929/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Hannes Famira**

Type designer and lecturer. Educated at the [Royal Academy of Art](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809032929/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Royal%20Academy%20of%20Art) in The Hague (_Den Haag,_ The Netherlands), he has taught type design and new media at the [SfG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809032929/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SfG), Schule für Gestaltung in Basel, CH as well as Lettering and Typedesign at the [NJCU](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809032929/http:/www.njcu.edu/dept/art/) New Jersey City University. Hannes runs the website [www.typEdu.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809032929/http:/www.typedu.org/) and the [kombinat-typefounders](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809032929/http:/typophile.com/wiki/kombinat-typefounders). He currently teaches [Digital Typedesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809032929/http:/www.cooper.edu/ce/design.html) and Experimantal Typography at the [Cooper Union](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809032929/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cooper%20Union) and Typography at CUNY.
author: Hannes Famira
